basic.description: This course expounds on topics such as one and two-way classifications, nesting, blocking, multiple comparisons, incomplete designs, variance components, factorial designs, confounding. Graduate credit for non-statistics majors only.
basic.subject: STA
basic.title: Analysis of Variance and Design of Experiments

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: One of STA 2122, STA 4322, or STA 5126.
